title: It's such a friendly-looking font.
author: kchinh

comments.content:
I think this is Emigre [Tarzana Narrow](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701102728/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/tarzana-ot/?refby=bowfin).

- Mike Yanega
Thanks, Michael. Trying to post a better photo of this. I love this font.
